title: Stripe
description: Stripe is a payment processing platform that allows you to accept payments online.

connectCTA.title: Powering Payouts with Stripe Connect
connectCTA.description: Monetize your chatbots. Get paid effortlessly.
features: Instant payouts to creators and vendors
Supports local and global payment methods

title: Google Calendar

description: Sync chatbot events, bookings, and reminders directly to your users’ Google Calendars.

connectCTA.title: Connect with Google Calendar
connectCTA.description: Sync chatbot events, bookings, and reminders directly to your users’ Google Calendars.
features: Two-way sync between Konvo and Google Calendar

title: Calendly
titleClassName: bg-gradient-to-br from-[#006BFF] via-[#00B2C3] to-[#00C5B4] text-transparent bg-clip-text
description: Let users schedule meetings or book appointments directly through your chatbot using Calendly.

connectCTA.title: Schedule meetings with Calendly
connectCTA.description: Let users book time with you or your team directly from the chatbot.
features: Auto-insert availability based on user intent
